newsitem.title: USA: Heritage Media to acquire radio station.
newsitem.headline: Heritage Media to acquire radio station.

text.p: Heritage Media Corp said on Friday it had agreed to acquire WHRR-FM, a radio station based in Rochester, N.Y., from Livingston Communications for an undisclosed amount.
Heritage said it presently owns and operates three stations in Rochester and will begin operating WHRR-FM under a local marketing agreement starting September 1.
After this deal, Heritage will operate 21 radio stations in eight major markets and six network-affiliated television stations, it said.
